clinical_study.brief_title: Esophageal Multisegmented FCSEMS for Malignant Strictures
clinical_study.official_title: EsophageAl mulTisegmented Fully covERed Self-expandable Metal Stent for Malignant Strictures: a Safety and Feasibility Study (EATERS Study)

arm_group.description: Placement of multisegmented fully covered self-expandable metal stent
